title: Font ID, Løgismose
content:
Hi guys

I'm looking for the typeface that says "Løgismose". Can you help me?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014103525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ImageGen_6457.jpeg)
author: Rupert Pupkin

comments.content: Aha. That explains the unbalanced G, the strange execution of the slash in Ø, as well as the heavy joins in M.
